page.title: 07ROSE HILL - THE THOMAS'S
page.content: Rose Hill ws originally built by the Thomas family who have lived in Mylor fo over 300 years. Seven people built the road, including father and sons (all Thomas's). Once the road was complete one Thomas asked his father for Â£1000 so as to build a terrace of houses in Rose Hill. His father refused him the money so he went to Mrs Holman who lived at Restronguet Farm, she lent him the Â£1000 for Â£5 on every Â£100 paid back. He was then able to build his terrace of houses on Rose Hill. Seventy-five years ago nobody except the Thomas family lived on Rose Hill.
